original_title: 壊心快落(かいしんかいらく)・崩れ落ちるインテリで傲慢な女社長の威厳 ディープス
overview: Ichika became an independent female president. The beautiful and tall Ichika is something everyone longs for. Kuroki and Yurikawa, who have longed for such a flower, were Ika's compliant pets. One day, the two became uncomfortable with the fact that Ichika's treatment for them became worse, and decided to make Ichika a sex toy for only two people. Ichika continues to be trained by the two and becomes a female slave drowned in pleasure.
title: The Fall Of A Dignified & Intelligent Female Entrepreneur
